EmailTemplate.description: PSA-IQVIAPSA-5349 - Relieve Primary Medical Reviewer Assignment Email
EmailTemplate.name: AGG_ET15_PSA_Relieve Primary Medical Reviewer Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Change of Aggregate Report Primary Medical Reviewer Assignment
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Primary Medical Reviewer listed on Aggregate Report: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Name} has changed.
The new Primary Medical Reviewer is: {!Aggregate_Report__c.Primary_Medical_Reviewer__c}.
Please contact your line manager if you have any questions.
Thank You.
